RESUME PORTFOLIO ABOUT

Natura Vision

Project type: Short animated movie
Role: CG supervisor
Software: Maya / EmberGen / Redshift / Nuke
Skills: Shading / Lighting / FX / Comp

Description:

Short movie for projection at Coral Kingdom at Loro Parque at Tenerife.

Responsibilities:

  • Figure our proper camera projection.
  • Integrate heavy water FX into animation scene.
  • Create smoke FX in EmberGen and particle simulation in Unreal.
  • Shading, lighting, and compositing.
